sec.label: B.3.5
sec.title: Other working forces
sec.p: Other working forces that can influence the stability shall be taken into account when calculating the stability, e.g.:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: the winch force between drill mast and drilling tool in the bore hole. The drill string and tool shall not be regarded as a support when only a rope is being used for pulling up the drilling tool;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: in the case of drilling down, the drill string shall not be considered as a support;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: in the case of upwards drilling, it shall be checked that the available feed forces do not make the rear part of the rig lift.
